definition: gradually ceasing to be visible, become feeble
details:
noun
- gradually ceasing to be visible
= synonyms: disappearance
- a golf shot that curves to the right for a right-handed golfer
= synonyms: slicing, slice
verb
- become feeble
= synonyms: languish
- become less clearly visible or distinguishable
= synonyms: melt
- disappear gradually
= synonyms: pass
- lose freshness, vigor, or vitality
= synonyms: wither
